alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:00PM CDT until July 18 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 259 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Ridge, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gordon, Rushville, White Clay, Clinton, Pine Ridge, Intersection of Highway 87 and Craven Creek Road, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road and Mount Maria. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 84 and 111. Highway 250 between mile markers 45 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
